about_the_game:
Thank You For Purchasing Austen Translation!

Included with the free Holiday Expansion we have prepared the following Desktop Wallpaper Set for you to download. We hope that you enjoy it.

Austen Translation Wallpaper Set
Featuring 4 Austen Rivals: Prunella, Audrey-Lynne, Octavia and Violette in the following resolutions: 1024x768, 1366x786, 1600x900, 1920x1080.

Files will download to the following folder on your computer: ...Steam\steamapps\common\Austen Translation\Wallpapers\
detailed_description:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: The Wallpapers should work for any version of OS X

name: Austen Translation - Expansion Wallpapers

short_description: Austen Translation Desktop Wallpapers featuring four ruthless rivals!
